documents.document:
Bollywood latest songs

Hindi music is utterly spongy, mellifluous, rhythmic and poetic. In this part of the world i.e. India, the music has variations – classical, semi-classical, ragas (all kinds of rags – pahari, thumri, sudh sarang, nautanki and all), ballads, pop and to name a few – one finds every flavor. The roots of the classical singing emerge from this land right from (rather before) era of Amir Khusro, who had brought it with him here. The noted names of the field of classical are from this fertile land from Bare Ghulam Ali Khan to Ustad Amjad Ali Khan, Ustad Bismillah Khan, Ustad Zakir Hussain to Pandit Shiv Shankar.+

Bollywood latest songs In HD

Movie: Namastey London story

Namastey London is a delight full and addictive show to watch, if you seen one time you must want more glimpses of the flick. The project titled Namastey London is directed by Vipul Amrutlal Shah, starring with Indian Barbie Kartrina Kaif and the stunt hero Akshey kumar in the lead roles.

Shahrukh Khan In Main Hoon Na

Shahrukh khan in Main Hoon Na is playing the role of an police officer named Major Ram Prasad Sharma. Farah Khan’s directorial debut happened with this flick, ‘Main Hoon Na’ that was the biggest blockbuster of the year 2004 starring Shahrukh Khan in Main Hoon Na, Zayed Khan, Sushmita Sen, Amrita Rao, Naseeruddin Shah and Suneil Shetty.

Shahrukh Khan In Main Hoon Na

Movie: Do Dooni Chaar

Planman Motion Pictures and Walt Disney Pictures presentation Do Dooni Chaar is the production of Arindham Chaudhari. Movie: Do Dooni Chaar is a comeback movie of Neetu Singh and Rishi Kapoor as a pair to big screen.

Movie: Do Dooni Chaar tells the story of a man called Santosh Duggal who teaches in a school and lives in a DDA flat in Delhi.

Movie: Do Dooni Chaar

Heritage of Pakistan

Pakistan is situated in the region that is laced with the rich cultural heritage, traditions and values called heritage of Pakistan. In particular, the traditions and values in Indo-Pak are what the whole world is filled with praises of! The centuries old customs in Pakistan and India grab the attention of the natives of the other countries and they get mesmerized with the magical heritage lies in this part of the world.
The true cultural heritage of Pakistan is seen in Cholistan where the centuries old buildings, tombs, the traditional lifestyle of the natives, their distinctive values, their cultural songs to celebrate the happy moments and even the shiny-sandy deserts with camels dolling up the jamboree acts with their possessors simply hypnotize and spellbind the eyes, which bump into them.

Heritage of Pakistan

Aamir Khan In Lagaan

Lagaan was a 2001 movie and received a nomination for Oscar. Aamir Khan in Lagaan was supereb as he is Mr. perfectionist no doubt. The flick was held to rock in 2001 but still fresh as its release time. This is a tale about the injustice and adversities done by British on the innocent ppl who face all the circumstance with courage and dignity.

There are Aamir Khan in lagaan alongside with the Gracie Singh is playing the lead role, a host of Indian also the British actors including Jessica Radcliffe and Rachel Shelley are in the flick.

Aamir Khan In Lagaan

Aishwerya Rai In Action Replayy

The green-blue eyed Bollywood beauty named Aishwerya Rai in Action Replayy, Action Replayy is a presentation of PVR Pictures. The movie is Producer and director Vipul Shah, Aishwerya Rai in Action Replayy is playing the role of Mala who keeps on fighting each other.

Aishwerya Rai In Action Replayy

Ajay Devgan In Omkara

The Hindi movie Omkara is directed by Vishal Bhardwaj and was released under banner of Big Screen Entertainer on 30 Nov -2001. Ajay Devgan in Omkara alongside Vivek Oberoi, Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan.
Ajay Devgan in Omkara make an aggressive performance. The music for the movie was arranged by musician Vishal Bhardwaj. The story has been dashed off by famous writer Vishal Bhardwaj.

Ajay Devgan in Omkara

Deepika Padukone in Om Shanti Om

Farah khan, a very blasting chorographer and film director took Deepika Padukone in Om Shanti Om (2007), the movie was a big hit and did well mat box office. Deepika Padukone in Om Shanti Om played double role, at the first site she was sultry actress and the second face was bubble chewing girl and want to be an actress of Bollywood just for the SRK.

Deepika Padukone in Om Shanti Om

Madhuri Dixit In Devdas

Madhuri Dixit is the pretty well known Bollywood actress. She is the brilliant actress and dancer having long list of successful movies to her name. Devdas is a movie that we can't ignore that. Madhuri Plays the role of Chandramukhi a tawaif (courtesan) who falls in love with Devdas. Yash Chopra’s Dil Tu Pagal Hai and Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s Devdas too got added in her repertoire of successful movies.

Madhuri Dixit In Devdas

Movie: Namastey London is a delight full and addictive show to watch, The project titled Namastey London is directed by Vipul Amrutlal Shah, starring with Indian Barbie Kartrina Kaif and the stunt hero Akshey kumar in the lead roles in Movie: Namastey London.
The melodious music of the movie is arranged by actor- singer cum music director Himesh Reshammiya, such an addictive and soulfull tunes are in the movie.

Movie: Namastey London

HumKo Deewana Kar Gaye

Directed by Raj Kanwar, the flick Humko Deewana Kar Gaye stars the likes of Akshay Kumar, Katrina Kaif, Bipasha Basu and Bhagyashree in the main leads. Bhushan Kumar and Krishan Kumar of T-Series produced this love saga, which music was scored by Anu Malik. The songs of this album were much popular and still remain the same. The title song was a spongy treat and glided aptly well on the ears soothing the souls altogether.

HumKo Deewana Kar Gaye

Desi Boyz Reviews


Desi Boyz Reviews: The movie got mixed review from the critics even from the public side. The Desi Boyz Reviews are mostly appreciate the chemistry between Akshey Kumar and John Abraham, but the movie has week story line. Some of the critics have described this as nonsense.

Vitiligo Cure

The disorder (Leucoderma dangerous the sickness of the skin discoloration for human living) sickness is characterised is in general found of the vitiligohuid by the verschijning of depigmented shreds (milky blank) white shreds, lichtrose shreds on the skin, these shreds more areas of the body, exposed to sunlight. as hands, feet, weapons, face and lips. Other common areas for white shreds to appear be the armpits, groin, around the mouth, around the eyes, the umbilical point, the genitals and the rectal areas.
